articles.title: Asian stocks dip as Omicron spreads, Fed decision looms - Reuters
articles.description: Asian stocks and oil prices slipped on Tuesday as the spread of the Omicron coronavirus variant rattled investors who were already on edge ahead of a slew of central bank decisions this week, including a key Federal Reserve meeting.

articles.title: New species of bacteria named after Singapore - The Star Online
articles.description: SINGAPORE (The Straits Times/Asia News Network): An unexpected discovery by a team of doctors analysing skin and wound samples has led to a new species of bacteria being identified and named after Singapore.

articles.title: Blinken touts deeper U.S. engagement amid concern over 'aggressive' China - Reuters
articles.description: Secretary of State Antony Blinken touted on Tuesday a U.S. strategy to deepen its Asian treaty alliances, offering to boost defence and intelligence work with partners in an Indo-Pacific region increasingly concerned over China's "aggressive actions".
